start.speaker: guido
start.text: Damn it is really busy over here, and everyone looks exactly the same.

start.speaker: guardian-mummy
start.text: So human, I hear that you are trying to steal my valued sceptre.

start.speaker: guido
start.text: Yes, but I need it to create an altar in my house.

start.speaker: guardian-mummy
start.text: Funny, I seem to be losing more and more sceptre's by the day, and you are unable to get one.

start.speaker: guardian-mummy
start.text: Maybe it has to do with how popular my pyramid has been lately!

start.speaker: guardian-mummy
start.text: It feels good not to be lonely anymore, and have all those people around me!

start.speaker: guido
start.text: You do realize these aren't actual players right?

start.speaker: guardian-mummy
start.text: Silence! Do not ruin this fine moment for me.

start.speaker: guardian-mummy
start.text: As I am in such a fine mood, I have decided to give you one of my precious sceptres.

start.speaker: guido
start.text: Let me guess.. You won't just hand it over, will you?

start.speaker: guardian-mummy
start.text: You read my mind! No, such a previous item should not be received easily.

start.speaker: guardian-mummy
start.text: I have hidden it in any of the chests in the next room.

start.speaker: guardian-mummy
start.text: You're guaranteed to get one, but who knows how long it will take!

start.speaker: guido
start.text: Well that sure as hell beats classic RNG.

start.speaker: guardian-mummy
start.text: Crack the locks to open the chests, and you might be rewarded with my sceptre.

complete.speaker: guardian-mummy
complete.text: Congratulations on finally receiving my sceptre.

complete.speaker: guido
complete.text: Thanks... If only it was this easy in the real game.

complete.speaker: guardian-mummy
complete.text: You should not give up so easily, those who persist will be rewarded.

complete.speaker: guido
complete.text: Tell that to all the bots over there...

complete.speaker: guardian-mummy
complete.text: Bots? There are no bots allowed in my pyramid!

complete.speaker: guido
complete.text: Well you should check your security if that is the case...

complete.speaker: guardian-mummy
complete.text: Nonsense! Anyway, I wish you the best of luck on the rest of your adventure.
